    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static List<LintProblem> run(String buffer,
                                    YamlLintConfig conf)
        Lints a YAML source represented as a string
        Parameters:
        buffer - a YAML configuration
        conf - yamllint configuration
        Returns:
        the list of problems found for the passed file, possibly empty (never null)

      • run

        public static List<LintProblem> run(YamlLintConfig conf,
                                    File file)
                             throws IOException
        Lints a YAML source represented as a file
        Parameters:
        conf - yamllint configuration
        file - the (YAML) file to lint
        Returns:
        the list of problems found for the passed file, possibly empty (never null)
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading the file

      • run

        public static List<LintProblem> run(String buffer,
                                    YamlLintConfig conf,
                                    File file)
        Checks a YAML string and returns a list of problems
        Parameters:
        buffer - the YAML content to be analyzed
        conf - yamllint configuration. Cannot be null.
        file - the file whose content has been passed as the buffer. May be null.
        Returns:
        the list of problems found on the passed YAML string

      • getProblemLevel

        public static Object getProblemLevel(Object key)
        Returns the level (Integer) or ID (String) of the passed ID (String) or level (Integer)
        Parameters:
        key - the problem level or ID
        Returns:
        an Integer or a String, or null if not found

      • getSyntaxError

        public static LintProblem getSyntaxError(String buffer)
        Parses the passed YAML string to detect syntax errors. If an error is met, a problem is return.
        Parameters:
        buffer - a YAML string
        Returns:
        a problem or null if there is no syntax error

      • getCosmeticProblems

        public static List<LintProblem> getCosmeticProblems(String buffer,
                                                    YamlLintConfig conf,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    File file)
        Returns the list of non-syntax related problems found with the passed YAML string. The file is optional (null) and is there for filtering the rules to be applied.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the YAML string to be checked
        conf - the YAML lint configuration
        file - file supposed to be the passed YAML string. Used to determined the rules to be applied. May be null.
        Returns:
        a list of problems found on the passed string
